property.value: Cannot do Entity Sync Push because entitySyncId [] is set for Pull Only.
Impossible d'effectuer la synchro (push) avec un configuration en mode esclave seulement (pull only).
Non è possibile fare Entity Sync Push perchè entitySyncId [] è impostato in Pull Only.
无法实现实体同步推送因为实体同步标识（entitySyncId []）被设置为了只能提取。
無法進行資料實體同步推送因為資料實體同步識別(entitySyncId [])被設定為 Pull Only.
